abstract: Ms. Keys, the pop-R&B singer, is a producer of Lydia R. Diamond's play about a well-to-do black family on Martha's Vineyard.
snippet: Ms. Keys, the pop-R&B singer, is a producer of Lydia R. Diamond's play about a well-to-do black family on Martha's Vineyard.

headline.main: Broadway State of Mind: Alicia Keys to Compose Music for 'Stick Fly'
